first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discusses the symbolic attributes of Janus, the Roman god of beginnings. last_phrase: In conclusion, the secret science and symbolism of ancient Roman builders and their guilds were based on sacred knowledge that survived the downfall of the empire. Their techniques and expertise continue to amaze and inspire modern engineers and masons, even to this day.
